login.subtitle: Sign in to your account to continue
login.noAccount: Don't have an account? Create account
login.haveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
login.resetPasswordBody: Enter your email. If valid, you'll receive an email with instructions to reset your password.
login.createAccountInfoBody: By creating an account you accept our terms of use and privacy policy.
login.confirmRegistrationBody: We've sent a confirmation code to {email}. Enter it to finish registration.

dashboard.welcomeSubtitle: Ready to create something amazing? Let's get started with your website management.
dashboard.editorGettingStartedBody: Get started by clicking the Editor tab to edit your pages. Select the "inicio" page to access all the fields and customize your website content with ease.
dashboard.enhanced2FABody: Your website is now more secure with our new Two-Factor Authentication system. Protect your content with mobile-based verification that's both easy to use and highly secure.

schema.deleteTemplateConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this template?
schema.deleteComponentConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this component?

editor.headerSubtitle: Create, edit and manage your website content with our content management system
editor.deleteContentConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this content?
editor.confirmSaveQuestion: Do you want to continue and save changes?
editor.changesWillBeSaved: Changes will be saved to your content library
editor.warningBody: If this content is low quality (false, biased or intended to manipulate), publishing it may contribute to disinformation and cause harm; please review and correct before confirming.

reports.headerSubtitle: Detailed analysis of your website performance
reports.restrictionText: This report is not available on your current license plan
reports.restrictionSubtitle: Upgrade your plan to access advanced analytics
reports.visitLocationSubtitle: Geographic analytics available on premium plans
reports.upgradeBody: Get detailed insights into visitor behavior, conversion metrics, performance analysis and more with our premium plans.
reports.featureRealtimeBody: Live monitoring of visitors and activity
reports.featureCustomReportsBody: Create reports tailored to your needs
reports.featureConversionBody: Measure the success of your goals

profile.subtitle: System & Profile Settings
profile.additionalInfoBody: For more information about the current license and terms of use, you can consult the full details.
profile.logoModalLabel: Select a PNG or SVG file for the logo
profile.loginImageModalLabel: Select a JPG or WebP image (max 500 KB)
profile.emailModalLabel: Configure contact email for technical support
profile.termsIntro: This website is owned and operated by the licensee. These Terms set out the terms and conditions under which you may use our website and services. By accessing or using the website, you agree to have read, understood and be bound by these Terms:
profile.termsSection1: To use this service, user registration is required with accurate personal data and a password. The user may choose and change the password for their admin account at any time. The service provider is not responsible if the site owner shares the password with third parties.
profile.termsSection2: All transactions made through this website are subject to confirmation and verification processes which may include validation of payment method and invoice. In some cases email verification may be required. Prices are valid for subscriptions made on this website.
profile.termsSection3: 2024@consciusCMS web design content management is a hosting and content management service for websites. This service may only be used for the described purposes and under the limitations of this license.
profile.termsIntroRestrictions: You have contracted a Basic content license with the following restrictions:
profile.termsList1: Maximum storage for this license is 300 MB total content.
profile.termsList2: Maximum visits for this license level is 1000 visits per month.
profile.termsList3: This license allows a single user to manage and edit website content.
profile.termsList4: Support for this license is limited to keeping the website operational.
profile.termsList5: This service is provided using Amazon Web Services infrastructure.
profile.noteBody: For full information on terms, privacy policy and limitations of liability, consult the complete legal documentation.

userProfile.changePasswordModalBody: Please provide your current password and new password:
userProfile.scanQRCodeInstruction: Please, scan this QR with your Authenticator application and provide the generated code to complete the 2FA configuration.

footer.description: Transforming ideas into digital reality with the power of Aurora.
